segments.text: OK . I'll take your bet , as long as the winner gets to pick the movie . What about you , Nick ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Do you want to go first , Sally ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not ! I rolled a five . The category is Best Pictures .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , here's your question What movie won the 1996 Oscar for Best Picture ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know that , it's The English Patient . It was one of the only good American movies of the 90s .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , along with Jurassic Park ! Nice going , you got the right answer .
segments.speaker: S2
